Articles.Content:
So I load up my save, go to my station and see this:

https://imgur.com/a/E61au3J

Prior to this, the docking port disappeared off of my lander.

I think this is an issue with docking ports.

What the hell happened here?
That's KSP physics for ya. Whenever you dock, send a Engineer Kerbal to strut the ports together, it lowers the chance of this happening
